summary: We testified about our work on oversight of Medicare Advantage, a private plan option for Medicare coverage. For example, we found that Medicare Advantage beneficiaries in the last year of life left the program to join traditional Medicare at twice the rate of other beneficiaries. This could indicate potential problems with their care. The Medicare program, which includes Medicare Advantage, is on our High Risk...
title: Medicare Advantage: Continued Monitoring and Implementing GAO Recommendations Could Improve Oversight
